protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9764
text: plants are grown vertically in petri dishes during 10 to 12 days in a growth chamber (temperature : day/night 24/21°C, 16h photoperiod). Duplicates were performed for each genotype (pht1;4 and fry1 mutants).
(Parameters: start time = 10, stop time = 12, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, max temperature = 24, temperature unit = C, media = MS/10 500micromolar Pi)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9765
protocol.text: Roots and rosettes of plants were harvested separately, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -45°C before extraction and analysis.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-9766
text: Total RNAs from leaves of plants was extracted with phenol-chloroform and precipitated in LiCl. Total RNAs from roots was extracted with the RNeasy plant mini kit (qiagen). RNAs are treated with DNase (DNA-free kit from Ambion). RNAs quality is checked by Agilent Lab-on-chip analysis.
